string.text: Three-piece Sharpening Stone Set

Super-practical 3 piece grindstone set for sharpening of blades and knives, packed in a nice polyester bag.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for knives and blades
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
"Brunox Gun Care" Spray Lubricant

Spray can containing oil intended for lubricating and protecting firearms. Frequent application will prevent guns from malfunctioning and corroding, especially after prolonged use in combat situations. Bear in mind, however, that the oil requires adequate tools to be spread properly and so that it can reach deep into weapon's inner mechanisms. "Brunox" should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] spray lubricant
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
"Dvojka" Gun Oil & Cleaning Solvent

Iconic Red Army oil that has been in service for almost 70 years. The metal bottle is divided into two separate compartments, one for oil and the other one for the cleaning solvent. Bear in mind, however, that the oil requires adequate tools to be spread properly and so that it can reach deep into weapon's inner mechanisms. "Dvojka" should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] liquid gun oil and cleaning solvent
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
"Rusak" Gun Oil

Plastic bottle containing a budget Russian mineral gun oil. Despite its low price, it can prove useful in keeping a firearm in good condition if applied frequently. Bear in mind, however, that the oil requires adequate tools to be spread properly and so that it can reach deep into weapon's inner mechanisms. "Rusak" should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] liquid gun oil
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
Hoppe's "No. 9" Cleaning Solvent

Western-made, high-quality firearm cleaning solvent, especially adapted for use in harsh environmental conditions, the Hoppe's No. 9 Bore Cleaning remains perhaps the most commonly used solution. Bear in mind, however, that the oil requires adequate tools to be spread properly and so that it can reach deep into weapon's inner mechanisms. "No. 9" should thus be regarded as more of an add-on than a stand-alone maintenance item.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] liquid gun cleaning solvent
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
"Progress" Handgun Cleaning Kit

A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. Such sets are quite commonly used in the Zone in order to keep firearms in good shape at all times. It is possible to utilize common tools to have better access to inner mechanisms or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. This particular set fits typical handgun calibers.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm, .45 and .357 caliber weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to clean dirty parts (above 60 condition) within guns. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > clean part.
"Aurora A108/12" 12 Gauge Cleaning Kit

A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. It is possible to utilize common tools to have a better access to inner mechanisms of a gun or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. This particular set fits 12ga shotguns.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 12ga weapons
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to clean dirty parts (above 60 condition) within guns. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > clean the desired part.
"ValuPro III" Smallbore Rifle Cleaning Kit

A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. Such sets are quite commonly used in the Zone in order to keep firearms in a good shape at all times. It is possible to utilize common tools to have a better access to inner mechanisms of a gun or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. This particular pack fits medium-caliber rifles with long barrels and comes in a hard plastic reusable container.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.45 and 5.56 caliber weapons
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to clean dirty parts (above 60 condition) within guns. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > clean the desired part.
Medium & Large Caliber Rifle Cleaning Kit

A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. Such sets are quite commonly used in the Zone in order to keep firearms in a good shape at all times. It is possible to utilize common tools to have a better access to inner mechanisms of a gun or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. Can also be used to better spread gun oil, however a more cost-efficient method used by most experienced stalkers entails the application of animal fat on the brushes as an alternative lubricant. This particular set fits large-caliber rifles and very long barrels. Manufacturer unknown, but its simple design and construction as well as very high quality materials used suggest a military, presumably special forces origin.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7.62, 7.92, 9x39 and .338 caliber weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to clean dirty parts (above 60 condition) within guns. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > clean the desired part.
Universal Weapon Cleaning Kit

Advanced gun cleaning kit fitting all common weapon calibers. Besides cleaning and maintenance, it can also be used as an effective repair tool. The set comprises a small portion of efficient lubricant and cleaning solvent as well as some light tools to facilitate access to inner mechanisms of a firearm. In order to maximize effectiveness, combine with additional materials or specialized repair sets.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • Cannot be used to clean weapon parts inside guns.
Handgun Repair Kit

This kit contains oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. It also by standard comes with set of elementary firearm spare parts. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of weapons with handgun calibers. It's also possible to additionally increase the effectiveness of the kit by borrowing certain materials from or combining with other kits during a single maintenance session.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm, .45 and .357 caliber weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to replace parts within a gun. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > replace the desired part.
Shotgun Repair Kit

This kit contains oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. It also by standard comes with set of elementary firearm spare parts. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of weapons with 12ga shotgun caliber. It's also possible to additionally increase the effectiveness of the kit by borrowing certain materials from or combining with other kits during single maintenance session.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 12ga weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to replace parts within a gun. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > replace the desired part.
Smallbore Rifle Repair Kit

This kit contains oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. It also by standard comes with set of elementary firearm spare parts. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of medium-caliber rifles. It's also possible to additionally increase the effectiveness of the kit by borrowing certain materials from or combining with other kits during single maintenance session.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.45 and 5.56 caliber weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to replace parts within a gun. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > replace the desired part.
Medium & Large Caliber Rifle Repair Kit

This kit contains oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. It also by standard comes with set of elementary firearm spare parts. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of large-caliber rifles. It's also possible to additionally increase the effectiveness of the kit by borrowing certain materials from or combining with other kits during single maintenance session.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7.62, 7.92, 9x39 and .338 caliber weapons
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Can be used to replace parts within a gun. Right-click a gun > maintain parts > replace the desired part.
Handgun Repair Kit (Empty Box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining 9mm, .45 and .357 caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
Shotgun Repair Kit (Empty Box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining 12ga caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
Smallbore Rifle Repair Kit (Empty Box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining 5.45 and 5.56 caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
Medium & Large Caliber Rifle Repair Kit (Empty Box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining large caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
Basic Sewing Kit

A light sewing kit consisting of a cloth reel, several steel needles and a pair of scissors. It can be used to sew up bullet holes or ruptures in soft fabrics of outfits. Its practical applications are limited due to the short length of the thread and subpar durability of needles, so the kit will be useless in case of more serious damage. For the same reason, it's compatible with only a handful of materials. Nonetheless, it is strongly advised to always use whatever is available to make the kit more effective.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
Advanced Sewing Kit

This advanced set contains more and better sewing accessories than its basic counterpart. Double reels of nylon thread and a large selection of higher-quality needles make it suitable for working on thicker and harder materials, including lighter mutant skins and artificial fibers. It is also capable of repairing more damaged outfits.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
Heavy Sewing Kit

This military-grade, heavy sewing kit is designed to handle fractures in protective plates of modern combat armors. It contains enough metallic thread to put together outfits that have literally been torn apart. Capable of sewing on even hardest of mutant hides to your armor of choice. Another advantage of the kit are the basic mechanical tools that can be used to disassemble outfits and headgear in order to salvage repair materials. It's the highest quality sewing kit available in the Zone.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
"Zviezda" Glue Tube

Cheapest of the synthetic adhesives available in the Zone, this epoxy-based solution may be used to put together slightly torn pieces of fabric or to patch up a small hole in your helmet, but it will be useless in case of any serious damage. Though, if used on a regular basis, it is able to keep your outfit in good shape at all times. It is advised to use any type of commonly found materials to greatly increase effectiveness of repair. The glue, however, won't support mutant skins. Can also be used to facilitate sewing.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
"Tur" Glue Tube

Advanced glue produced by the Ukrainian chemical industry, modified epoxy-based adhesive "Tur" is able to quickly bind most solid materials. Versatility and ease of use are the two reasons why "Tur" is kept in such a high regard among stalkers, especially since spare materials are scarce. The glue binds both textile fabrics and lighter protective materials like Kevlar, but is useless when it comes to metals.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
"M17" Glue Tube

M17 is a result of a Soviet military-industrial research project intended to devise an extremely potent, single-ingredient adhesive which could be used in any situation regardless of purpose and materials involved. There is almost no damage that the glue, combined with appropriate materials, won't be able to repair. Can be used with all materials available in the Zone.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
Emergency Armor Repair Set

A repair set allowing the user to perform emergency repairs of outfits. Includes military grade ducktape and ready-to-use sheets of thick textile in a variety of shapes and sizes which make it possible to quickly patch up any outfit damage. This is especially useful to prevent further structural damage of already damaged suits. Due to a relatively low durability of provided materials, the kit can be used only for minor repairs and is ineffective in case of harder materials like Kevlar or metal. For this reason, the kit has a very limited use in headgear maintenance.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] adhesive tape
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
Headgear Repair Kit

This kit contains everything that is needed to perform effective repair of modern combat helmets. It features heavy tools that will allow work on hard materials such as Kevlar, steel or titanium, as well as a very strong, methacrylate-based adhesive. As the kit does not contain any sewing equipment, it cannot be effectively utilized for reparation of flexible materials of armors, but it can be used to disassemble headgear sets to greatly improve the effectiveness of repair.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] medium and heavy headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
Heavy Outfit Repair Kit

This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary, from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches, for conducting complete repairs on any hi-tech armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade Kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and headgear sets
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing equipment
Light Armor Repair Kit

This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary, from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches, for conducting complete repairs on any hi-tech armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade Kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] very light and light armors
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] used for repairing light armor
Medium Armor Repair Kit

This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary, from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches, for conducting complete repairs on any hi-tech armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade Kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] medium armors
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] used for repairing medium armor
Heavy Armor Repair Kit

This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary, from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches, for conducting complete repairs on any hi-tech armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade Kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] heavy armours
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] used for repairing heavy armor
Exoskeleton Repair Kit

This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary, from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches, for conducting complete repairs on any hi-tech armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade Kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] any exoskeleton
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing exoskeleton equipment
Multitool

A worn but functional multitool, used to disassemble weapons and armor on parts and to maintain worn and rusty trigger mechanisms.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] disassembling tool
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for weapon parts maintenance
File

A file, used to restore weapon parts such as a worn or rusty barrel or breech head.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for weapon parts maintenance
Ramrod

An old ramrod consisting of three composite wooden parts, used to restore parts such as worn or rusty barrels and gas tubes.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for weapon parts maintenance
Basic Sewing Thread

This sewing thread is made out of many different materials including cotton, linen, nylon, and silk. Every stalker knows it's not easy to avoid cloth tearing every so often due to the harsh environment inside the Zone. Saving a couple of sewing threads for long trips is a wise idea.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for outfit parts maintenance
Field Armour Toolkit

An advanced toolkit for sewing and sealing retardants. Including Kevlar thread, one of the strongest and most heat resistant commercially available threads. It is about 2.5 times stronger than nylon and polyester, has very little stretch, does not melt, and decomposes at 800F. This makes it a great choice for high stress applications including sewing seams on heavy duty clothing.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for outfit parts maintenance
